text: Allah apeleche chilandanyo cha mundu jwajukwete mabwana gakamusyangana gagakangana (mpela mundu jwagalagatila isanamu), ni mundu jwaagamba kuntumichila bwana jumpepe (mpela mundu jwagalagatila Allah pe), ana ŵaŵiliŵa mpaka aŵe yalumo (kaŵe kao) nkwalandanyamo? Lumbili losope lwene alapikwe Allah, nambo ŵajinji mwa ŵanganyao ngaakumanyilila
